product_name: NEMO Pillowtop 1P Sleeping Pad Cover - X-Long - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The extra-long Pillowtop 1P Sleeping Pad Cover slides over your sleeping pad to add a full inch of soft foam insulation for a warmer, more-comfortable night's sleep at the campground.
short_description: The extra-long Pillowtop 1P Sleeping Pad Cover slides over your sleeping pad to add a full inch of soft foam insulation for a warmer, more-comfortable night's sleep at the campground.
